title: Yay, I just played a game that didn't happen.
body: I just played a game of teambuilder with a friend, and it was a tense game, but we pulled through and won. we both skipped stats because it was taking a while, and we both went to our match history to check the match report. it wasn't there. We also didnt get any mastery points or Ip. The game literally didn't count.

replies.body: Same here -__- Was in promos too...
